name: Sepia Theme
description:
Light eye-friendly theme

Goals:
  • healthy for eyes and good for a night's sleep => reducing blue light
  • readable => minimal and logical usage of colors and effects

Usage
I recommend to use a night light system's option with a screen's warm profile always on.
sunny day: ~10% or even 0%
night: ~60%

Adjusted languages:
  • Java
  • JavaScript
  • TypeScript
  • Python
  • PHP
  • Go
  • Groovy
  • User-Defined File Types

On GitHub | Report an issue

Font: Fira Code, Size: 18, Line-spacing: 1.1
